answers.author: Alexandra Iannolo
answers.text:
Hello,
I found some sample Interim Manager Agreements that may help as a start.
Encinitas, CA:
http://www.cityofencinitas.org/NR/rdonlyres/DCCF301B-2C2D-4DCA-A4D4-7ED9A080AAA3/0/InterimCityManagerAgreement.pdf
Rockville, MD:
http://rockmail.rockvillemd.gov/clerk/egenda.nsf/d5c6a20307650f4a852572f9004d38b8/1b772fda04f1e256852578ab00717747/$FILE/ATTACH%20A%20Interim%20Agreement%20for%20TC%206-10.pdf
Solana Beach, CA:
http://www.ci.solana-beach.ca.us/csite/cms/app_engine/assets/images/agmt%20(2011)%20ott%20-%20city%20mgr%20interim%20employment.pdf
South Hadley, MA:
http://www.massmanagers.org/Pages/MMMA_Resources/Interim_TA_agreement.pdf
Ali Iannolo
Knowledge Network Intern
aiannolo@ICMA.org


Hello,

I found some sample Interim Manager Agreements that may help as a start.
Encinitas, CA:
http://www.cityofencinitas.org/NR/rdonlyres/DCCF301B-2C2D-4DCA-A4D4-7ED9A080AAA3/0/InterimCityManagerAgreement.pdf

Ali Iannolo
Knowledge Network Intern

answers.author: Jennifer Kimball
answers.text:
FYI - the City of Rockville document link above is an agreement with the firm managing our downtown development rather than an employment agreement.

author: Robert Carty
text: If you have a copy of an acting or interim manager's agreement you'd like to share, please email it to careers@icma.org. We'd like to include a few samples in the Acting Manager's Handbook. Thanks!
title: Acting/Interim Manager Agreements
